summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6074 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Southwest from West Webster Street to West Holly Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83379, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as sown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
